issue_title: [Test] 缺少 __version__ 的单元测试。当前测试文件未验证 __init__.py 中导出的 __version__ 是否可正常访问。

triage.root_cause: Missing unit test for __version__ in flywheel/__init__.py
verification_targets: Test that __version__ can be imported from flywheel module
Test that __version__ is a valid version string format
triage.risk_assessment: Low risk - purely a test addition, no source code changes required
